section.title: Faster payments, better cash flow
section.p: Money will come within 2 business days, improve your brand, and look more professional when you enable "payments" by Wave. This will let you accept credit cards and bank payments for as low as 1% per transaction.

section.title: Give your customers what they want
section.p: Customers want an easy fast way to pay online without any hassle. You can email your customers an invoice and they can use the simple and secure “Pay Now” button to send over your payment. Fees are low and there are no hidden fees.

section.title: Never lose track of payments
section.p: With Wave, your invoices and payments will automatically flow into your historical records. You’ll never lose track of your payments, and you’ll be all set at tax time.

section.title: Send your invoices
section.p: Email invoices with a secure “Pay Now” button after you’ve turned on the online payments option. These are important to have for your business.

section.title: Get paid online
section.p: Customers can pay by using credit card or secure bank payment when they view the invoice online. Automated bookkeeping will help your payments connect flawlessly with your Wave account.

section.title: Money is deposited
section.p: You’ll receive the money in your account within 2 business days for credit card payments and 2-7 business days for bank payments .
